answerText: kidney[10] This thicker segment of the nephron is also called the distal straight tubule and functions in removing sodium from the filtrate, a main factor in water resorption.
heading: Penn Bowl |2014 | 14 | 17 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This organ contains the glomerulus and calyx, as well as its own pyramid and pelvis. For 10 points each: [10] Name this organ located in the retroperitoneum that primarily filters water soluble waste into urine from the blood.
